sobreNosotros.title: About Us
sobreNosotros.text: We are Quick Carry, a logistics company located in Uruguay, with warehouses located throughout the country, with our main headquarters in Montevideo. In addition to having a high technological level, our systems also have a high level of security just like our trucks. You want to transport anything to another part of the country, because with us your shipments will arrive safely and on time.

elegirnos.title: Why choose us?
elegirnos.el1: Optimize the route and delivery time
elegirnos.el2: Allows products to be delivered anywhere in the country
elegirnos.el3: Evita las entregas fallidas. Trackeo y control de las entregas
elegirnos.el4: Improve customer satisfaction and generate more sales

seguimiento.error: There is no Package with that code
